body:
Due to the new Avicus Official Tournament 2 being announced (Road To Victory) here is a post containing information about the media team and how we will work during events.

We currently have 10 members in the media team meaning there will be plenty of chances to sit back, relax and enjoy the events!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

These people are (including Twitch/YouTube  links):


-awesome_apricot (www.twitch.tv/awesome_apricot)
-Legoche (www.twitch.tv/flamingskullyt) (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC2wXVvM8v9XWs_kgO-9TLw)
-Lgmatias (www.twitch.tv/lgmatias) | https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_1gYThr4BLjeTeL-FbZ3BA)
-Shadowolf365 (www.twitch.tv/shadowolfyt)
-SilverFox_YT
-SpookehSkeletons (www.twitch.tv/spookehskeletons)
-Tazz (www.twitch.tv/mrtazz4077HD) (https://www.youtube.com/user/MrTazz4077HD)
-Vladthegreat100 (www.twitch.tv/vladthegreat100)
-Jiveh (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9hpGWhoUxxU8EK4NrJAWbw)
-Tynvale (https://www.youtube.com/user/Tynvale)

Co-commentators:

-Cacal_Nathbrown

-ihze 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We will announce (on this forum topic) who will be streaming the upcoming event/tournament matches. Therefore, there is no confusion as to who's twitch account to go to when the event starts.

The media team is here to allow everyone to experience the excitement of official events though there are a few rules;

- Any team member caught watching streams whilst playing in a tournament match to gain a tactical advantage (whether in first person, third person or with a delay) will be punished accordingly.
- Any player caught watching the streams and communicating with one of the teams playing will be punished accordingly.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Be sure to follow everyone on twitch to never miss out on streams, thanks!

-The media team

We currently have 10 members in the media team meaning there will be plenty of chances to sit back, relax and enjoy the events!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-awesome_apricot (www.twitch.tv/awesome_apricot)

-ihze 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We will announce (on this forum topic) who will be streaming the upcoming event/tournament matches. Therefore, there is no confusion as to who's twitch account to go to when the event starts.

The media team is here to allow everyone to experience the excitement of official events though there are a few rules;

- Any team member caught watching streams whilst playing in a tournament match to gain a tactical advantage (whether in first person, third person or with a delay) will be punished accordingly.
- Any player caught watching the streams and communicating with one of the teams playing will be punished accordingly.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Be sure to follow everyone on twitch to never miss out on streams, thanks!

-The media team
title: The Media Team - Race To Victory

replies.body:
- Join stream off your twitch account, and we see that you are currently on the stream
- You admit to watching the stream directly while playing
- You admit to watching while playing indirectly and that person reports you with evidence
- You have someone else watching the stream and telling you the info at the same time and someone finds out, gains evidence and tells us.
replies.body_tagged:

- You admit to watching while playing indirectly and that person reports you with evidence
- You have someone else watching the stream and telling you the info at the same time and someone finds out, gains evidence and tells us.
